item.title: Configuring Appwrite Functions with K3s
item.description: This guide outlines configuring Appwrite Functions within a K3s environment. It covers essential steps, including installing ngrok for external network access, registering a GitHub App, and setting up Appwrite with required configurations. The process involves updating YAML files for deployment, ensuring proper routing with Traefik, and creating functions through the Appwrite interface. Once set up, the functions are deployed successfully, enabling seamless integration and execution within the K3s infrastructure.
